name: Keep unread icon for Feedly
description: Quick hack to add a icon for the 'keep unread' link to the actions bar of Feedly's web interface.

user.name: skaulana
user.about: Hi there! So I guess we both like stylesheets, huh?

additional_info: Fixed alignment for long titles with relative positioning - however this means the icon is no longer left-justified against other actions.
